channel.title: Web3 Security Paper Digest
channel.description: Curated papers on Web3, blockchain, and smart contract security from ArXiv and ACL

item.title: An end-to-end agentic pipeline for smart contract translation and quality evaluation
item.description:
Summary

  • Presents an end-to-end pipeline that translates natural-language contracts into structured schemas and generates Solidity smart contracts.
  • Performs automated quality assessment including compilation, security checks, and multi-dimensional scoring (functional completeness, state-machine correctness, business-logic fidelity, variable fidelity, code quality).
  • Uses agentic (CrewAI-style) teams with iterative refinement and provenance metadata, supports paired evaluation against ground-truth implementations, and identifies systematic error modes (e.g., logic omissions, state transition inconsistencies).
  • Designed to support extensions to formal verification and compliance checking, providing a reproducible benchmark for smart contract synthesis quality.

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Abhinav Goel', 'Chaitya Shah', 'Agostino Capponi', 'Alfio Gliozzo']
  • Tags: ['smart-contracts', 'automated-synthesis', 'security-evaluation', 'LLM-code-generation', 'benchmarking']
